author: serge
msg: Have the mailet context set the attribute with the list of servernames (in Constants.SERVER_NAMES)

author: serge
msg: Modified to wrap the JDBC3 methods in a special token that ant will compile if you're using JDK 1.4

author: serge
msg: Set DNS error (when no A, CNAME, or MX records are found for a host) to be a temporary exception.  Per bug 8160

author: serge
msg: Added hopefully much nicer error messages, handling a variety of possible exception classes and eventually ideally producing clean error messages for all delivery error types.

author: danny
msg: strip unnessesary escap slashes from ip address domain literals in square brackets
there is no need for any slashes in this, so we can just strip them all.
